segments.text: Mr . Wang , have you enjoyed your stay here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I ’ Ve enjoyed it very much . I ’ Ve met my old friends and made some new friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ Ve all enjoyed being with you . When will you come back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m looking forward to seeing you again . Take care .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The same to you . Keep in touch .
segments.speaker: S2
